text: Allahane tumacyasathi toca dina (dharma) nirdharita kela ahe, jyala kayama karanyaca adesa tyane nuha (alai.) La dila hota, jo (vahayidvare) amhi tumacyakade pathavila ahe ani jyaca khasa adesa amhi ibrahima ani musa ani isa (alai.) Yanna dila hota ki ya dina (dharma) la kayama rakha ani yata phuta padu naka, jya gostikade tumhi tyanna bolavita ahata, ti tara (tya) anekesvaravadyanna apriya vatate. Allaha jyala icchito apala nivadaka (dasa) banavito ani jo dekhila tyacyakade laksa kendrita karato, tara asance to yathayogya margadarsana karato
